function_reachability: Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'printf'?
Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i < 50' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i < 50' always executed?
Is it possible that the loop with condition 'j > 0' is never executed?
Is the loop with condition 'j > 0' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < 50' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'j > 0' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Is variable 'argc' used after its definition?
Is variable 'argv' used after its definition?
liveness: Is variable 'k' live at the end of function 'main'?
Is variable 'argc' live at the end of function 'main'?
